> 1. Salary differences in gender(F/M) among departments

```{r message=FALSE}
Q1 = employee %>%
  group_by(Dept, Gender) %>%
  summarise(Salary = mean(Salary)) %>%
  na.omit()
ggplot(Q1, aes(x = Dept, y = Salary, fill = Gender)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity", position = "dodge") +
  theme_minimal()
```
